scripts.test: npm run test:php && npm run test:js
scripts.start: npm run start:docker && npm run start:mshots && echo mshots service successfully in the mshots docker container. && echo Port 8000 is mapped to localhost, e.g. http://localhost:8000/mshots/v1/example.com
scripts.stop: docker-compose exec mshots sh -c 'test -f /var/run/mshots.pid && kill `cat /var/run/mshots.pid` && echo Master Process killed && rm -f /var/run/mshots.pid || echo already stopped'; npm run stop:docker
scripts.restart: npm run stop; npm run start
scripts.status: docker-compose exec mshots bash -c 'echo mShots Master process: `set -o pipefail; ps ax | grep Master | grep -v grep | awk "{print \\$1}" || echo not running` ; echo Workers: `ps ax | grep Worker | grep -v grep | wc -l`'
scripts.config:core: rm .env; cp docker-compose-core.yml docker-compose.yml ; npm run build
scripts.config:dev:
echo "UID=$(id -u)
GID=$(id -g)" > .env; docker-compose -f docker-compose-core.yml -f docker-compose-dev-override.yml config > docker-compose.yml; npm run build
scripts.docker:install-chromium-binary: docker-compose run mshots bash -c 'cd node_modules/puppeteer; node install.js'
scripts.prepare: npm run config:dev; npm run build; npm run docker:install-chromium-binary
